entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Longitudinal Election survey 2003-2006
entry.dcterms:creator: Hegedűs, Péter
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-G81: TÁRKI Longitudinal Election survey 2003-2006. data sheet. Version: 2011-04-07
entry.dcterms:creator: Angelusz, Róbert
entry.dcterms:description: The Hungarian Election Study (HES) project was initiated by the Hungarian Center for Democracy Foundation and has been conducting collaborative studies of Hungarian voting behavior and public opinion since 2003. The primary aim of HES is to study electoral behavior from a broader social science perspective in collaboration with major Hungarian research institutes. It focuses on the interrelationship between cleavage structures, social and cultural stratification, and digital divides. HES studies are also putting emphasis on the methodological questions of empirical survey based research.
